The first step is to import libraries.

```{R include=TRUE}
library(reticulate)
use_condaenv('py36')
library(RadaFDR)
```

Load the dataset.

```{R include=TRUE}
data = data_airway()
p = data[0]
x = data[1]
```

Fast mode adafdr test:
```{R include=TRUE}
res <- adafdr_test(p, x, fast_mode=TRUE)
res$n_rej
```

Full adafdr test (with optimization steps)
```{R include=TRUE}
res <- adafdr_test(p, x, fast_mode=FALSE)
res$n_rej
```
